    "SSRewardText": "There are notable similarities between the crest you discovered in Senenthia and the symbols on the door, so you decide to break into the house in search of information about the crest.\n\nInside, you discover that the building belongs to House Ferbert, a branch of House Casthak specializing in diplomacy and politics. You find some documents and information about prominent figures in Faeborgnian society, but given the current situation, this information is useless to your group.\n\nIt seems they were working on building a trustworthy relationship between the people of Senenthia and Faeborg.
